deepin

deepin is an elegant GNU/Linux distribution from China. According to distrowatch ranking, it is most popular Chinese GNU/Linux distribution. Deepin is unique, because of itâ€™s unique desktop environment based on html 5 technologies, known as deepin desktop. Also, deepin provides a lot of great applications like deepin movie player, deepin music player, deepin control center, deepin Software Center ..etc

Home Page https://www.deepin.org/en/
